metadata.title: CVE-2024-1580 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow in dav1d AV1 decoder that can occur when decodingvideos with large frame size. This can lead to memory corruption within theAV1 decoder. We recommend upgrading past version 1.4.0 of dav1d.

criterions.comment: dav1d package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
